name: Shrek Shooter 2
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys. Left click to shoot. Space bar to dash. You can see blue particles when your dash is ready. Dashing makes you invincible so its super good.  Press the tab key to pause the game. Don't die. 

OTHER STUFF:

This game is still in development. I just started working on it (May 1st, 2021). I am planning on making more levels. This a remake of one of my friend's old scratch games.  It might be more of a sequel. Link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/258612301/
